name: Korosseo
description:
Description:

This is a school project we worked on for a semester. It is a wave based arena shooter with two separate classes to choose from. The dynamic, but fragile Ninja and the slow, but sturdy Knight. The goal is to survive as many waves as you can and protect the eye of the Ancient One.

Controls:

Check out the key binding menu.

Credits:
